name: Cube Runner 3D (Ashborn14)
description:
Cube Runner 3D

This game is a stylish 3D Action Speed Hyper Casual Computer Game which can be enjoyed by anyone with easy control sideways (A and D) movement.

 
You are a fast red cube runner that collects red cubes and scores points. If any other object obstacle is hit it is game over.

Put your fingers to keyboard and let's beat the game.

Instructions :

  • To start game press left mouse button or spacebar or press enter
  • Move left with A or left arrow key
  • Move right with D or right arrow key
  • Collect red cubes to score points
  • Avoid other obstacles and all green and blue cubes

Game Information : Runs on PC/Laptop Windows build (64 bit)

Theme : Speed, Fun to play, Action, Casual, Challenging, Running, relaxing, Competitive

Game Mechanics : Uses Collision types and methods, VFX, Unity Animation, GUI elements etc.

Assets : All visual, and graphical assets has been created by game author(me).

For audio used refer to the following website and is copyright free in public domain - https://mixkit.co/

Inspiration : To create an easy fun game play with simple and aesthetic game design.

Let's all have fun and play together.
